title: Ring of the Tortoise
data:
{{version032}} {{flavour|A rough-hewn aquamarine ring, half of an ancient pair. Its wearer is exceptionally difficult to harm.}} [[File:Ring_of_the_Tortoise.png]] '''''the ring of the Tortoise'''''
+8 AC ==Desirability== The '''ring of the Tortoise'''{{source ref|0.32.0|art-data.txt|1124}} offers a massive amount of general defense, plain and simple. Finding one early on can do amazing things for the survivability of your character, and will remain a helpful aid into the late game. Don't be afraid to swap it out if you need some crucial resistance for a fight, but most characters would be wise to wear this as a general ring. ==History== *Prior to [[0.26]], this ring was called the '''ring of Robustness'''. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Jewellery]]
